main event: Observers in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, reported seeing a reddish-bluish colored object shaped like a banana disappear into the clouds on July 12, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 20 seconds by witnesses in a car, who described the sky conditions as hazy with daylight., There were conflicting reports about the time of observation., No sound was heard during the sighting., The object appeared to travel at a steady speed but also remained stationary at times., The witnesses noted the object disappeared into the clouds after being seen.
sighted object: reddish-bluish colored object shaped like a banana
